mapper.select: Select * from student order by std_no
mapper.insert: insert into student(std_no, std_name, std_phone, birth_date) values(#{stdNo}, #{stdName}, #{stdPhone}, #{birthDate})
mapper.select: select b.writer as "writer" , m.member_nm as "member_name" , count(1) as "member_cnt" from tbl_board b join tbl_member m on b.writer = m.member_id group by b.writer, m.member_nm
